Paragraph: In this study , we retrospectively analyzed the safety and efficacy of combination regimen of bortezomib , thalidomide , and dexamethasone ( VTD ) as consolidation therapy in 24 Japanese patients with newly diagnosed MM .

| dexamethasone |

These are the valid chemical entities identified in the paragraph. The combination therapy mentioned is called VTD (bortezomib, thalidomide, and dexamethasone).
